scripts.i: npm run pack_react_native_harmony && npm run pack_react_native_harmony_sample_package && npm run install:react_native_harmony && npm run install:react_native_harmony_sample_package && npm install
scripts.install:hooks: cd .. && husky install tester/.husky && cd tester && npx husky add .husky/pre-push "cd tester && npm run verify"
scripts.postinstall: node ./scripts/create-build-profile && npm run reinstall:react_native_harmony && npm run reinstall:react_native_harmony_sample_package
scripts.reinstall:react_native_harmony: npm uninstall react-native-harmony && npm run pack_react_native_harmony && npm run install:react_native_harmony
scripts.reinstall:react_native_harmony_sample_pa: npm uninstall react-native-harmony-sample-package && npm run pack_react_native_harmony_sample_package && npm run install:react_native_harmony_sample_package
scripts.dev:codegen: npm run reinstall:react_native_harmony_sample_package && npm run install:local-cli && npm run codegen -- --debug
scripts.install:local-cli: cd ../react-native-harmony-cli && npm pack && cd ../tester && npm i ../react-native-harmony-cli/rnoh-react-native-harmony-cli-0.0.26.tgz
scripts.dev:hbc: npm run codegen && react-native bundle-harmony --dev --bundle-output /tmp/bundle.harmony.js && hermesc --emit-binary /tmp/bundle.harmony.js -out ./harmony/entry/src/main/resources/rawfile/hermes_bundle.hbc
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:cpp
scripts.format:cpp:check: npm run --silent find_changed_files:cpp | sed 's#^#../#' | xargs clang-format --dry-run --Werror --style=file:../.clang-format
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run lint:js && npm run format:cpp:check
scripts.start: npm run codegen && hdc rport tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && react-native start
scripts.find_changed_files: { git diff --name-only main...; git diff --name-only; git diff --name-only --cached; } | sort | uniq
scripts.dev:test: npm run codegen && set APP_ENV=test && react-native bundle-harmony --minify=false
scripts.dev:dev: npm run codegen && set APP_ENV=dev && react-native bundle-harmony --minify=false
